H0.text: What is the title of Simon and Garfunkel’s only UK number one hit single. Bridge Over Troubled Water

H1.text: What is the title of Simon and Garfunkel’s only UK number one hit single. The Sound of Silence

H2.text: What is the title of Simon and Garfunkel’s only UK number one hit single. Cecilia

H3.text: What is the title of Simon and Garfunkel’s only UK number one hit single. Song for the asking

A4.text: Bridge over Troubled Water, the lead single, reached number one in five countries and became the duo's biggest seller.

A5.text: Their most famous recordings include three U.S. number-one singles—'The Sound of Silence' and the two Record of the Year Grammy winners 'Mrs. Robinson' and 'Bridge over Troubled Water'— as well as...
